articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: TVS Motor Company acquires European e-bike maker Swiss E-Mobility Group for $100 million - Economic Times
articles.description: The second acquisition in less than a year will offer India's third largest two-wheeler maker $100 million in revenues from the growing e-bike space of Europe – which is the largest in the world.
articles.content:
In a bid to globalize the TVS group and participate in the $25 billion global e-bike market, TVS Motor Company on Thursday acquired a 75% stake in the Swiss E-Mobility Group (SEMG).
The second acqui… [+2676 chars]

BRUSSELS, Jan 27 (Reuters) - NATO allies are putting forces on standby and sending reinforcements to eastern Europe in response to Russia's buildup of more than 100,000 troops on Ukraine's borders.

articles.title: Australia has offered to export more liquefied natural gas to Europe in light of Ukraine tensions. Here's why - ABC News
articles.description: Australia offers to provide liquefied natural gas to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies in light of Ukraine tensions.
articles.content: Australia has offered to provide additional liquefied natural gas (LNG) to "friends and allies" in Europe, should Moscow decide to cut off energy supplies to European countries heavily reliant on gas… [+7971 chars]

articles.title: Hong Kong may maintain COVID-19 isolation until 2024, risking exodus: Euro chamber - CNA
articles.description: HONG KONG: Hong Kong may only reopen in early 2024 because of its stringent COVID-19 policies, which could trigger an exodus of foreign firms and staff and jeopardise its role as a financial hub, the city's European Chamber of Commerce said in a draft report.…
